Instructions

Submitted papers must be neither previously published nor under review by another workshop, conference or journal.

Only electronic submissions in PDF format will be accepted. Submitted articles must be written in English, conforming to the page limit, in 10-point font and must render without error using standard PDF viewing tools.

Page Limit

Full Paper 12 pages (excluding references)
Short Presentations 4 pages (excluding references)

Papers should use the submission template and instructions for LNCS, available at Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS) .

Submission
To submit your paper, please follow below link to the submission site:

Easy Chair

Note that at least one of the authors of each paper accepted for presentation in ReacTS Workshop must be registered. All papers presented at the workshop will be included in the Proceedings in LNCS from Springer.

Camera-Ready Instructions

You will receive the information via your email for camera-ready instructions.

Contact

If you have any problems or questions, please contact us via e-mail at: rfervari@unc.edu.ar / martins@ua.pt

Important Dates AoE

  • Submission deadline: August 20, 2024.

  • Notification of acceptance: September 20, 2024.

  • Camera-ready due: October 20, 2024.

  • Workshop: November 5, 2024.
